data.eml:eml: The scentless plant bug, Liorhyssus hyalinus (Fabricius) (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Rhopalidae): Description of immature stages and notes on its life history

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cornelis, Marcela, Quirán, Estela, Coscarón, María C (2012): The scentless plant bug, Liorhyssus hyalinus (Fabricius) (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Rhopalidae): Description of immature stages and notes on its life history. Zootaxa 3525: 83-88, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.210973
